original_text: Jesus answered, “You would have no power over me if it were not given to you from above. Therefore the one who handed me over to you is guilty of a greater sin.”
korean_text: 예수께서 대답하시되 위에서 주지 아니하셨더라면 나를 해할 권한이 없었으리니 그러므로 나를 네게 넘겨 준 자의 죄는 더 크다 하시니라

sentences.original_text: You would have no power over me
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 내게 어떤 권세도 없을 것이다

sentences.original_text: if it were not given to you from above
the one who handed me over to you
is guilty of a greater sin
